title: Mahavatar Narsimha Worldwide Box Office Day 32: Creates History, Becomes First Indian Animated Film To Enter The 300 Crore Club!
snippet: Week after week, Mahavatar Narsimha continues to achieve milestones both in India and at the worldwide box office. Despite several new releases arriving in theatres, along with magnum opuses

title: How ‘Saiyaara’ and ‘Mahavatar Narsimha’ became the sequel slayers of 2025
Mahavatar Narsimha Box Office Collection Day 32: Mythological animated film earns Rs 302 crore worldwide
snippet: After a month-long run through the fifth Sunday, Mahavatar Narishma has earned 302 crore worldwide, setting new standards for the genre while demonstrating the power of Indian animated narrative.

title: गजब ये है कि 'महावतार नरसिम्हा' 2 हफ्ते से हर दिन तोड़ रही 'सैयारा' का रिकॉर्ड
snippet: Mahavatar Narsimha Box Office Collection Day 32: 'महावतार नरसिम्हा' ने 15वें दिन से लेकर आज तक हर दिन 'सैयारा' को मात दी है. यकीन न हो तो आंकड़े देख लीजिए.

title: Mahavatar Narsimha box office: Ashwin Kumar's animated venture crushes Jawan, Pathaan, Gadar 2 & Animal to achieve this feat
snippet: Explore the groundbreaking visual effects techniques used to create the stunning, hyper-realistic form of Lord Narsimha.
